name: 上海粗炒
recipe: 椰菜洗淨切細。 (Wash and finely chop the cabbage.)
紅蘿蔔去皮切絲。 (Peel and shred the carrot.)
蒜頭去皮切蓉。 (Peel and mince the garlic.)
豬肉切絲，加入1茶匙生抽、砂糖、胡椒粉、麻油及油拌勻。 (Slice the pork, add 1 tsp of soy sauce, sugar, pepper powder, sesame oil, and oil, and mix well.)
加入粟粉拌勻，醃約半小時。 (Add corn starch, mix well, and marinate for about half an hour.)
冬菇浸軟切片。 (Soak the dried mushroom until soft and slice.)
煮沸水，加入粗麵煮至煮透。 (Bring water to a boil and cook the thick noodles until fully cooked.)
燒熱油，炒香肉絲、蒜蓉及冬菇。 (Heat oil and stir-fry the pork, minced garlic, and mushrooms until fragrant.)
加入粗麵炒勻。 (Add the cooked noodles and stir well.)
加入椰菜及紅蘿蔔炒勻。 (Add the cabbage and carrot and stir well.)
加入雞湯、2茶匙生抽、老抽、蠔油及砂糖煮勻。 (Add chicken broth, 2 tsp of soy sauce, dark soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sugar, and mix well.)
最後加入1/2茶匙麻油炒勻。 (Finally, add 1/2 tsp of sesame oil and stir well.)

name: 棉花雞
item: 胡椒粉 (Ground White Pepper) 少許
recipe: 浸軟冬菇及魚肚。 (Soak the dried shiitake mushrooms and fish maw.)
水加薑片煮沸，魚肚煮約5分鐘，熄火浸泡約兩小時。 (Bring water with ginger slices to a boil, cook the fish maw for about 5 minutes, then turn off the heat and soak for about 2 hours.)
薑刨成蓉，壓出薑汁。 (Grate the ginger and extract the ginger juice.)
雞扒解凍切四。 (Thaw and cut the chicken thigh into four pieces.)
雞扒加入4克鹽、8克砂糖、蠔油、胡椒粉及1/4茶匙薑汁拌勻。 (Add 4g of salt, 8g of sugar, oyster sauce, ground white pepper, and 1/4 tsp of ginger juice to the chicken and mix well.)
再加入10克油及5克粟粉拌勻，醃約1-2小時。 (Then add 10g of oil and 5g of corn starch, mix well, and marinate for about 1-2 hours.)
魚肚輕輕擠乾水份，切四。 (Gently squeeze out the moisture from the fish maw and cut into four pieces.)
冬菇擠乾水份，切片。 (Squeeze out the moisture from the dried shiitake mushrooms and slice.)
魚肚及冬菇加1/4茶匙薑汁、2克鹽、4克砂糖拌勻。 (Mix the fish maw and mushrooms with 1/4 tsp of ginger juice, 2g of salt, and 4g of sugar.)
再加入5克油及5克粟粉拌勻。 (Then add 5g of oil and 5g of corn starch, and mix well.)
混合所有材料，以中火蒸約15分鐘。 (Combine all ingredients and steam over medium heat for about 15 minutes.)

name: 豬肉燒賣
item: 梅頭肉/豬扒 (Pork Butt/Pork Chop) 120克
胡椒粉 (Ground White Pepper) 適量
recipe: 1. 乾冬菇浸軟備用。 (Soak the dried shiitake mushrooms until soft and set aside.)
2. 雞蛋取出蛋黃。 (Separate the egg yolk from the egg white.)
3. 麵粉、蛋黃、1/8茶匙鹽、水及黃薑粉拌勻揉成團。 (Mix the flour, egg yolk, ⅛ tsp of salt, water, and turmeric powder until a dough forms.)
4. 攤平麵團包保鮮紙冷藏約半小時。 (Flatten the dough, wrap in plastic wrap, and refrigerate for about half an hour.)
5. 豬肉及豬油稍為切碎。 (Chop the pork and pork lard into smaller pieces.)
6. 蝦一半切粒，一半拍扁備用。 (Chop half the shrimp and flatten the other half for later use.)
7. 冬菇切粒備用。 (Chop the soaked shiitake mushrooms into small pieces and set aside.)
8. 豬肉及拍扁的蝦攪至起膠。 (Mix the pork and flattened shrimp until they become sticky.)
9. 加入切好的冬菇、豬油及蝦。 (Add the chopped mushrooms, pork lard, and shrimp to the mixture.)
10. 加入4克鹽、砂糖、生抽及胡椒粉拌勻。 (Add 4 g of salt, sugar, soy sauce, and ground white pepper, and mix well.)
11. 加入豬油拌勻。 (Add the pork lard and mix thoroughly.)
12. 加入粟粉拌勻，包保鮮紙冷藏約半小時。 (Add corn starch and mix well, then wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate for about half an hour.)
13. 紅蘿蔔去皮刨片切粒。 (Peel the carrot, slice it thinly, and then chop into small pieces.)
14. 桌面撒手粉，麵團擀成薄麵皮。 (Dust the countertop with flour and roll out the dough into thin circles.)
15. 切出直徑約7-8cm的圓形。 (Cut out circles with a diameter of about 7-8 cm.)
16. 麵皮中間位置加入豬肉餡包起，在表面放上紅蘿蔔粒。 (Place the pork filling in the center of the dough skin, then top with carrot pieces.)
17. 中大火蒸10-15分鐘完成。 (Steam over medium-high heat for 10-15 minutes to finish.)

name: 乾煸四季豆
recipe: 1. 四季豆洗淨備用。 (Wash the green beans and set aside.)
2. 蒜頭及薑去皮切成蓉。 (Peel and mince the garlic and ginger.)
3. 生抽、醋及砂糖拌勻備用。 (Mix soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar together and set aside.)
4. 四季豆摘去頭尾，把兩側的粗纖維撕掉，切半後瀝乾水分。 (Trim the ends of the green beans, remove the tough fibers from the sides, cut in half, and drain.)
5. 落油燒熱鍋，加入四季豆炒香，分開盛起四季豆及油。 (Heat oil in a pan, add the green beans and stir-fry until fragrant, then separate and set aside the beans and oil.)
6. 加入少許油將豬肉碎炒熟盛起。 (Add a little oil and cook the minced pork until done, then set aside.)
7. 再加入少許油以小火爆香薑蒜及豆瓣醬。 (Add a little more oil and sauté the ginger, garlic, and chili bean sauce over low heat until fragrant.)
8. 加入四季豆及豬肉碎炒勻。 (Add the green beans and minced pork, and stir well.)
9. 加入紹興酒及調味料炒勻，完成。 (Add Shaoxing wine and the seasoning mixture, stir well, and it's done.)

name: 亂切牛扒
recipe: 1. 3瓣蒜頭切成蒜片，洗淨瀝乾水。 (Slice 3 cloves of garlic and rinse to drain.)
2. 小火炸至金黃色，瀝起備用。 (Fry on low heat until golden brown, then drain and set aside.)
3. 1/2洋蔥切絲備用。 (Slice ½ onion and set aside.)
4. 1/4洋蔥切件與1瓣蒜頭打碎。 (Cut ¼ onion into pieces and crush with 1 clove of garlic.)
5. 加入日式醬油、味醂、黑糖、喼汁及水打成蓉。 (Add Japanese soy sauce, mirin, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, and water, and blend into a puree.)
6. 洋蔥汁稍為煮沸備用。 (Bring the onion juice to a slight boil and set aside.)
7. 牛扒切件，加入適量黑椒及鹽調味。 (Cut the steak into pieces and season with an appropriate amount of black pepper and salt.)
8. 燒熱鍋，煎香牛扒。 (Heat the pan and sear the steak.)
9. 加入洋蔥絲，按喜好煎熟牛扒，完成。 (Add the sliced onion and cook the steak to your liking, and it’s done.)

name: 日式海軍咖哩
item: 日式咖哩粉 (Japanese Curry Powder) 15克
recipe: 1. 薯仔、洋蔥、紅蘿蔔去皮切件備用。 (Peel and chop the potato, onion, and carrot, and set aside.)
2. 雞扒切件備用。 (Cut the chicken thigh into pieces and set aside.)
3. 混合咖哩粉及辣椒粉，以小火烘香後盛起。 (Mix the curry powder and chili powder, toast them over low heat, then set aside.)
4. 煮溶牛油，加入麵粉煮至微棕色，加入炒好的咖哩粉拌勻，離火備用。 (Melt the butter, add the flour, and cook until slightly brown, then mix in the toasted curry powder and set aside off the heat.)
5. 燒熱油鍋，大火煎香雞扒。 (Heat oil in a pan and sear the chicken pieces over high heat.)
6. 加入薯仔、洋蔥、紅蘿蔔略炒。 (Add the potato, onion, and carrot, and stir-fry briefly.)
7. 加入咖哩醬、雞湯、水煮勻。 (Add the curry sauce, chicken broth, and water, and stir well.)
8. 加入黑糖及鹽，加蓋以小火煮約半小時。 (Add brown sugar and salt, cover, and simmer on low heat for about half an hour.)
9. 關火後加入印度酸辣醬、朱古力、即溶咖啡粉拌勻。 (Turn off the heat and add chutney, chocolate, and instant coffee, mixing well.)

name: 土匪雞翼
item:
雞翼 (Chicken Wing) 500克
米酒 (Rice Wine) 1湯匙
大蒜鹽 (Garlic Salt) 0.5茶匙
糖 (Sugar) 2茶匙
玉米澱粉 (Corn Starch) 1茶匙
生抽 (Light Soy Sauce) 1湯匙
蠔油 (Oyster Sauce) 1湯匙
孜然粉 (Cumin Powder) 1茶匙
五香粉 (Chinese Five Spice) 0.5茶匙
辣粉或七味粉 (Spicy Powder or Seven Flavour Powder) 1-2茶匙
recipe: 1. 徹底清洗雞翅，然後擦乾。 (Rinse the chicken wings and dry them thoroughly.)
2. 將大蒜鹽和米酒加入雞翅中。 (Add garlic salt and rice wine to the chicken wings.)
3. 混合均勻。 (Mix them well.)
4. 將糖、玉米澱粉、生抽、蠔油、孜然粉、五香粉、辣粉或七味粉加入雞翅中。 (Add sugar, corn starch, light soy sauce, oyster sauce, cumin powder, Chinese five spice, and spicy powder or seven flavour powder to the chicken wings.)
5. 再次混合均勻。 (Mix well again.)
6. 用保鮮膜包好。 (Cover with plastic wrap.)
7. 拿出來並預熱烤箱至200攝氏度。 (Take out and preheat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.)
8. 將醃料沾上醬料，放在烤盤上。 (Dip the marinated sauce and place on the baking tray.)
9. 在每個雞翅上撒上更多孜然粉。 (Sprinkle more cumin powder on each chicken wing.)
10. 在200攝氏度下烘烤12分鐘或更久。 (Bake at 200 degrees Celsius for 12 minutes or more.)
note: 這道菜香辣可口，非常適合下酒。 (This dish is spicy and delicious, perfect for pairing with drinks.)

name: 泡椒雞翼
recipe: 1. 雞翼解凍備用。 (Thaw the chicken wings and set aside.)
2. 混合500克水、鹽、紹興酒及2片薑煮沸。 (Mix 500g of water, salt, Shaoxing wine, and 2 slices of ginger and bring to a boil.)
3. 加入雞翼煮沸後轉小火煮約十分鐘。 (Add the chicken wings, bring to a boil, then reduce to low heat and cook for about 10 minutes.)
4. 泡椒剪半，指天椒剪碎。 (Cut the pickled peppers in half and chop the hot pepper.)

5. 混合花椒、指天椒、泡椒、2片薑、白醋、雞湯、100克水、鹽及砂糖煮沸放涼。 (Mix Sichuan peppercorn, hot pepper, pickled peppers, 2 slices of ginger, white vinegar, chicken broth, 100g water, salt, and sugar, bring to a boil, and let cool.)
6. 雞翼浸冰水降溫。 (Soak the chicken wings in ice water to cool.)
7. 雞翼淋上泡椒汁裝入器皿，冷藏約一至兩天。 (Drizzle the chicken wings with the pickled pepper sauce, place in a container, and refrigerate for about 1 to 2 days.)

name: 韓式炆牛仔骨
recipe: 1. 韓式炆牛仔骨介紹。 (Introduction to Korean Braised Short Ribs.)
2. 甘筍及蘿蔔去皮切件。 (Peel and chop the carrots and radish.)
3. 雞脾菇及鮮冬菇切件。 (Cut the king oyster mushrooms and shiitake mushrooms into pieces.)
4. 雪梨去皮去芯切件。 (Peel and core the Asian pear, then chop.)
5. 薑切片去皮，蒜頭去皮，辣椒去蒂，洋蔥去皮切件。 (Slice the ginger and peel the garlic, remove the stem from the chili, and chop the onion.)
6. 牛仔骨切件。 (Cut the short ribs into pieces.)
7. 辣椒、蒜頭、薑先放入攪拌機打碎，再加入雪梨及生抽打成醬汁。 (Blend the chili, garlic, and ginger first, then add the Asian pear and soy sauce to make the sauce.)
8. 稍為煎香牛仔骨。 (Sear the short ribs briefly.)
9. 加入甘筍及蘿蔔、醬汁、黑糖及麻油炒勻，加水加蓋以小火煮約15分鐘。 (Add the carrots and radish, sauce, brown sugar, and sesame oil, stir well, add water, cover, and simmer on low heat for about 15 minutes.)
10. 加入洋蔥、鮮冬菇及雞脾菇炒勻，加蓋煮約10分鐘。 (Add the onion, shiitake mushrooms, and king oyster mushrooms, stir well, and cover to cook for about 10 minutes.)
11. 稍為拌勻，開蓋再煮約5-10分鐘收汁。 (Stir gently, then uncover and cook for another 5-10 minutes to reduce the sauce.)

name: 蠔仔粥
recipe: 1. 蠔仔洗淨瀝乾水。 (Wash the oysters and drain.)
2. 方魚乾洗淨去除多餘部分，剪細。 (Wash the dried flounder fish, remove excess parts, and cut into small pieces.)
3. 芫茜洗淨切碎。 (Wash and chop the coriander.)
4. 免治豬肉加入生抽、砂糖、麻油、胡椒粉及紹興酒拌勻醃半小時。 (Marinate the minced pork with soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, pepper powder, and Shaoxing wine for half an hour.)
5. 白鑊烘香方魚乾。 (Dry-fry the dried flounder fish in a pan until fragrant.)
6. 白飯浸水，用手弄散飯粒。 (Soak the rice in water and use your hands to break up the grains.)
7. 下油煎香豬肉碎。 (Heat oil and sauté the minced pork until fragrant.)
8. 加入雞湯、方魚乾、水、白飯及冬菜煮滾後加蓋以小火煮10分鐘。 (Add chicken broth, dried flounder, water, rice, and preserved cabbage; bring to a boil, then cover and simmer on low heat for 10 minutes.)
9. 加入調味料拌勻加蓋煮5分鐘。 (Add the seasonings, mix well, cover, and cook for another 5 minutes.)
10. 加入蠔仔及芫茜以小火煮勻，完成。 (Add the oysters and coriander, stir well, and cook over low heat until done.)

name: 黑椒牛仔骨
recipe: 1. 洋蔥去皮切條，蒜頭去皮切成蓉。 (Peel and slice the onion into strips, and mince the garlic.)
2. 牛仔骨洗淨切件。 (Wash the beef short ribs and cut into pieces.)
3. 加入1茶匙生抽、紹興酒、黑椒及1/4茶匙砂糖拌勻。 (Add 1 tsp of soy sauce, Shaoxing wine, black pepper, and 1/4 tsp of sugar, and mix well.)
4. 依序加適量水、粟粉及油拌勻，醃約半小時。 (Gradually add enough water, corn starch, and oil, mix well, and marinate for about half an hour.)
5. 2茶匙生抽、1茶匙砂糖及蠔油拌勻。 (Mix 2 tsp of soy sauce, 1 tsp of sugar, and oyster sauce together.)
6. 加入喼汁、美極及100毫升水拌勻。 (Add Worcestershire sauce, Maggi seasoning, and 100 ml of water, and mix well.)
7. 下油，以大火煎牛仔骨至7-8成熟，盛起備用。 (Heat oil and sear the beef short ribs over high heat until 70-80% cooked, then set aside.)
8. 炒香蒜蓉及1茶匙黑椒。 (Sauté the minced garlic and 1 tsp of black pepper until fragrant.)
9. 加入洋蔥炒香。 (Add the sliced onion and sauté until fragrant.)
10. 加醬汁煮至洋蔥軟身，中途按情況加水。 (Add the sauce and cook until the onion is soft, adding water as needed.)
11. 加入牛仔骨以中小火煮熟。 (Add the beef short ribs and cook on medium-low heat until fully cooked.)
12. 混合粟粉及水，加入拌勻。 (Mix the corn starch with water, then add and stir well.)
13. 加入麻油炒勻，完成。 (Add sesame oil and mix well to finish.)

name: 椒鹽豬扒
item: 胡椒粉 (Ground White Pepper) 適量
紅尖椒 (Red Chili Pepper) 適量
胡椒粉 (Ground White Pepper) 適量
recipe: 1. 揼鬆豬扒，切成闊條狀。 (Pound the pork chops to tenderize and cut them into wide strips.)
2. 加入生抽、3茶匙紹興酒、1/2茶匙砂糖及胡椒粉拌勻。 (Add soy sauce, 3 tsp of Shaoxing wine, 1/2 tsp of sugar, and ground white pepper, and mix well.)
3. 按需要加水拌勻。 (Add water as needed and mix well.)
4. 加入粟粉及油拌勻。 (Add corn starch and cooking oil, and mix well.)
5. 蔥分開切成蔥白及蔥花。 (Separate the green onion into white parts and chopped green parts.)
6. 紅尖椒切粒備用。 (Chop the red chili pepper and set aside.)
7. 蒜頭去皮切成蓉分兩份，一半沖水瀝乾水備用。 (Peel and mince the garlic, dividing it into two portions; rinse one half and drain.)
8. 燒熱油，加入蒜蓉以中小火炸至金黃色。 (Heat oil and fry the minced garlic over medium-low heat until golden brown.)
9. 加入豬扒以小火炸至金黃，熟透後盛起。 (Add the pork chops and fry over low heat until golden brown and cooked through, then remove.)
10. 炒香蔥白及蒜蓉。 (Sauté the white parts of the green onion and the fried garlic until fragrant.)
11. 加入豆瓣醬、五香粉及胡椒粉炒勻。 (Add chili bean sauce, five spice powder, and ground white pepper, and stir well.)
12. 加入鹽及1/8茶匙砂糖炒勻。 (Add salt and 1/8 tsp of sugar, and mix well.)
13. 加入2茶匙紹興酒炒勻。 (Add 2 tsp of Shaoxing wine and mix well.)
14. 加入豬扒、紅椒及蔥花炒勻至乾身。 (Add the pork chops, red chili pepper, and chopped green onion; stir until well combined and dry.)
15. 椒鹽豬扒加入炸蒜，完成。 (Add the fried garlic to the salt and pepper pork chops to finish.)

name: 豉油皇撈麵
recipe: 1. 蒜頭去皮切片。 (Peel and slice the garlic.)
2. 紅蔥頭去皮切絲。 (Peel and slice the shallot into thin strips.)
3. 燒熱油，加入蔥蒜以小火炸至金黃色。 (Heat oil and add the shallots and garlic, frying over low heat until golden brown.)
4. 老抽、生抽、蠔油、砂糖、雞粉及水煮勻。 (Combine dark soy sauce, soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar, chicken powder, and water, and bring to a boil.)
5. 蔥蒜油隔走炸蔥蒜，加入麻油拌勻備用。 (Strain the fried shallots and garlic from the oil, then mix in the sesame oil and set aside.)
6. 燒熱油鍋，魚片頭以中火炸至金黃色。 (Heat oil in a pot and fry the triangular fish blocks over medium heat until golden brown.)
7. 煮滾水，加入粗麵煮熟後沖冷水。 (Bring water to a boil, add the thick noodles, cook until done, and then rinse with cold water.)
8. 將粗麵放回熱水沖數秒後盛起。 (Return the thick noodles to hot water for a few seconds, then remove.)
9. 加入約1湯匙豉油醬汁拌勻。 (Add about 1 tbsp of the soy sauce mixture and mix well.)
10. 加入蔥蒜油拌勻。 (Add the shallot and garlic oil and mix well.)
11. 加入魚片頭、七味粉及炸蔥蒜伴碟，完成。 (Add the fish blocks, shichimi, and fried shallots and garlic to serve, and it's done.)

name: 芝士忌廉蝦意粉
item: 淡忌廉 (Whipping Cream or Heavy Cream) 105ml
recipe: 1. 水加鹽煮沸, 按包裝指示時間減一分鐘煮熟闊條麵備用。 (Boil water with salt, cook fettuccine according to package instructions minus one minute.)
2. 蒜頭去皮拍扁備用。 (Peel and crush the garlic and set aside.)
3. 檸檬刨皮, 切片去籽備用。 (Zest the lemon, slice it, and remove the seeds.)
4. 煮溶牛油, 加入蒜頭及檸檬片煮勻。 (Melt the butter, add garlic and lemon slices, and mix well.)
5. 加入蝦炒熟後盛起備用, 檸檬片及蒜頭取走。 (Add the shrimp and stir-fry until cooked, then set aside, removing the lemon slices and garlic.)
6. 淡忌廉加鹽以小火煮勻。 (Heat the whipping cream with salt over low heat, stirring well.)
7. 加入蝦, 檸檬皮及巴馬臣芝士煮勻。 (Add the shrimp, lemon zest, and Parmesan cheese, and mix well.)
8. 加入闊條麵以小火拌勻後盛起。 (Add the fettuccine, mix well over low heat, and serve.)
9. 灑上少許黑椒及巴馬臣芝士, 完成。 (Sprinkle with a little black pepper and Parmesan cheese, and it’s done.)

name: 海鮮芝士意粉
item: 巴馬臣芝士碎 (Shredded Parmesan Cheese) 10克
水牛芝士碎 (Shredded Mozzarella Cheese) 20克
recipe: 1. 牛油煮溶，加入麵粉拌勻。 (Melt the butter and add the flour, mixing well.)
2. 牛油起泡後，一邊拌勻一邊加入牛奶。 (Once the butter bubbles, gradually add the milk while mixing.)
3. 加入鹽及砂糖，拌勻至煮沸變濃稠。 (Add salt and sugar, mixing until it boils and thickens.)
4. 加入巴馬臣芝士碎拌勻備用。 (Add the shredded Parmesan cheese and mix well, then set aside.)
5. 煮沸水，加鹽，按包裝指示煮熟意粉。 (Boil water with salt and cook the fettuccine according to package instructions.)
6. 蒜頭去皮切成蓉。 (Peel and mince the garlic.)
7. 海鮮加鹽及黑椒拌勻備用。 (Season the seafood with salt and black pepper and set aside.)
8. 意粉瀝乾水備用。 (Drain the cooked fettuccine and set aside.)
9. 燒熱油，蒜蓉炒香後加入海鮮炒勻。 (Heat oil, sauté the minced garlic until fragrant, then add the seafood and stir-fry.)
10. 加入白酒及意粉炒勻。 (Add white wine and fettuccine, mixing well.)
11. 轉小火，加入白汁拌勻。 (Reduce the heat and add the white sauce, mixing thoroughly.)
12. 意粉用可入爐器皿裝好，表面鋪水牛芝士碎。 (Transfer the fettuccine to an oven-safe dish and top with shredded mozzarella cheese.)
13. 開頂火，以最高溫焗5-10分鐘至表面金黃色。 (Preheat the oven and bake at the highest setting for 5-10 minutes until the top is golden brown.)

name: 風乾豬面頰肉番茄意粉
item: 乾辣椒片 (Red Pepper Flakes) 適量
recipe: 1. 豬面頰肉番茄意粉介紹。 (Introduction to Guanciale Tomato Pasta.)
2. 1升水加¼茶匙鹽煮沸，加入意粉按包裝指示煮熟，意粉水備用。 (Bring 1 liter of water with ¼ tsp of salt to a boil, add the pasta, and cook according to package instructions, reserving the pasta water.)
3. 豬面頰肉片切細備用。 (Slice the guanciale into small pieces and set aside.)
4. 芝士刨碎備用。 (Grate the cheese and set aside.)
5. 煎香豬面頰肉至逼出油分。 (Sauté the guanciale until the fat is rendered.)
6. 加入黑椒、乾辣椒片及白酒。 (Add black pepper, red pepper flakes, and white wine.)
7. 加入番茄，加蓋煮至濃稠，稍為調味。 (Add the canned tomatoes, cover, and cook until thickened, adjusting seasoning as needed.)
8. 加入意粉及適量意粉水，煮至收汁。 (Add the pasta and enough reserved pasta water, cooking until the sauce reduces.)
9. 加入芝士拌勻，上碟。 (Mix in the cheese and plate.)
10. 意粉表面灑上適量芝士。 (Sprinkle additional cheese on top of the pasta.)

name: 牛肝菌忌廉意粉
item: 巴馬臣芝士 (Parmigiano Reggiano) 適量
recipe: 1. 牛肝菌浸水約30分鐘，瀝乾水後切細。 (Soak the dried porcini mushrooms in water for about 30 minutes, then drain and chop finely.)
2. 蒜頭去皮切粒備用。 (Peel and mince the garlic and set aside.)
3. 煮滾水，加入鹽及意粉根據包裝指示煮熟。 (Bring a pot of water to a boil, add salt and cook the fettuccine according to package instructions.)
4. 落油炒香蒜蓉。 (Heat oil in a pan and sauté the minced garlic until fragrant.)
5. 加入牛肝菌及鹽以中火炒勻。 (Add the chopped porcini mushrooms and salt, and sauté over medium heat.)
6. 加入黑椒煮至牛肝菌稍為軟身。 (Add black pepper and cook until the porcini mushrooms are slightly softened.)
7. 加入白酒及忌廉煮勻。 (Add white wine and whipping cream, stirring to combine.)
8. 加入意粉，按情況加入意粉水煮勻，熄火。 (Add the cooked fettuccine and adjust with reserved pasta water as needed, then turn off the heat.)
9. 加入巴馬臣芝士拌勻上碟，完成。 (Mix in the Parmigiano Reggiano and plate to serve.)

name: 布丁 (Pudding)
recipe: 1. 在鍋中，將30g糖和3湯匙水混合。加熱至深棕色。加入3湯匙熱水到焦糖糖漿中，然後倒入布丁模具中。 (In a pot, mix 30g of sugar with 3 tablespoons of water. Heat until deep brown. Add 3 tablespoons of hot water to the caramel syrup and pour it into the pudding mold.)
2. 在碗中，將2個全蛋、2個蛋黃和1茶匙香草精攪拌均勻。 (In a bowl, whisk together 2 whole eggs, 2 egg yolks, and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract.)
3. 在另一個微波安全碗或鍋中，加熱35g糖和250g牛奶1分30秒，或直到糖完全溶解。 (In another microwave-safe bowl or pot, heat 35g sugar and 250g milk for 1 minute 30 seconds, or until the sugar is completely dissolved.)
4. 在攪拌牛奶混合物的同時，逐漸將其倒入打好的蛋液中。過濾混合物兩次以確保順滑和奶油的質地。 (Gradually pour the milk mixture into the beaten eggs while stirring. Strain the mixture twice to ensure a smooth and creamy texture.)
5. 將蛋液倒入準備好的布丁模具中。根據模具的大小，在140°C (280°F)下烘焙40至55分鐘。 (Pour the egg mixture into the prepared pudding mold. Bake at 140°C (280°F) for 40 to 55 minutes, depending on the size of the mold.)
6. 讓布丁冷卻幾分鐘後，至少冷藏6小時。 (Let the pudding cool for a few minutes, then refrigerate for at least 6 hours.)
note: 這道布丁口感滑順，非常美味. This pudding has a smooth texture and is very delicious.

name: 免烤草莓起司蛋糕
item: 起司蛋糕: 6inch (15cm) 圓模餅乾 (Biscuit) 100克
草莓果凍: 草莓泥 (Strawberry Purée) 150克
recipe: 1. 將餅乾壓碎，與融化奶油混合，壓入模具底部。 (Crush the biscuits and mix with melted butter. Press into the bottom of the mold.)
2. 將奶油起司、酸奶油、糖和牛奶混合在一起。 (Mix cream cheese, sour cream, sugar, and milk together.)
3. 將明膠溶解在水中，並加入混合物。 (Dissolve gelatin in water and add to the mixture.)
4. 加入草莓泥，充分混合。 (Add strawberry purée and mix well.)
5. 將鮮奶油和糖打發，然後輕輕混入混合物中。 (Whip heavy cream and sugar, then fold into the mixture.)
6. 將混合物倒入準備好的模具中，冷藏。 (Pour the mixture into the prepared mold and refrigerate.)
7. 製作草莓泥：將草莓、糖和檸檬汁混合。 (To make strawberry purée: blend strawberries, sugar, and lemon juice.)
8. 製作草莓果凍：將草莓泥、水和明膠混合。 (To make strawberry jelly: mix strawberry purée, water, and gelatin.)
9. 製作檸檬果凍：將水、檸檬汁、糖和明膠混合。 (To make lemon jelly: mix water, lemon juice, sugar, and gelatin.)
10. 冷卻果凍並將其放在芝士蛋糕上。 (Chill the jelly and top it on the cheesecake.)
note: 這道芝士蛋糕口感清新，非常適合做甜點. (This rare cheesecake has a refreshing taste, perfect for dessert.)

name: 朱古力曲奇
recipe: 1. 溶化牛油備用。 (Melt the butter and set aside.)
2. 朱古力塊切碎備用。 (Chop the chocolate chunks and set aside.)
3. 雞蛋打勻備用。 (Beat the egg and set aside.)
4. 麵粉、可可粉及梳打粉拌勻。 (Mix the flour, cocoa powder, and baking soda.)
5. 加入軟紅糖、砂糖/海藻糖及鹽，拌勻。 (Add soft brown sugar, sugar/trehalose, and salt, and mix well.)
6. 加入雲呢拿油及朱古力塊，拌勻。 (Add vanilla extract and chocolate chunks, and mix well.)
7. 加入牛油及雞蛋，拌勻至沒有粉粒。 (Add the melted butter and beaten egg, and mix until there are no flour lumps.)
8. 放置約半小時，預熱焗爐至180℃。 (Let it rest for about half an hour, and preheat the oven to 180°C.)
9. 麵團分成六份（約40克），搓圓壓平。 (Divide the dough into six pieces (about 40g each), roll into balls and flatten.)
* 確保預留足夠空間。 (* Ensure enough space between the cookies.)
10. 焗約3-5分鐘，完成。 (Bake for about 3-5 minutes, and it's done.)

name: 桃膠雪蓮子甜品
recipe: 1. 桃膠、雪蓮子及雪燕膠浸泡約7-8小時或過夜。 (Soak peach resin, snow lotus seed, and snow swallow for about 7-8 hours or overnight.)
2. 去除桃膠及雪燕膠的雜質後洗淨。 (Remove impurities from peach resin and snow swallow, then rinse.)
3. 紅棗切半去核，桂圓浸泡約10分鐘。 (Cut the red dates in half and remove the pits, soak the dried longan for about 10 minutes.)
4. 木瓜切頭，舀走中間的木瓜核及木瓜肉。 (Cut off the top of the papaya and scoop out the seeds and flesh.)
5. 水加入片糖、紅棗及桂圓煮沸。 (Add water, slab sugar, red dates, and dried longan to a pot and bring to a boil.)
6. 加入桃膠及雪燕膠，煮約10-15分鐘。 (Add peach resin and snow swallow, and cook for about 10-15 minutes.)
7. 最後加入雪蓮子及糖桂花煮約1分鐘。 (Finally, add snow lotus seed and osmanthus syrup, and cook for about 1 minute.)
8. 糖水加入木瓜盅，中小火蒸約5-10分鐘，完成。 (Pour the syrup into the papaya bowl and steam over medium-low heat for about 5-10 minutes, and it's done.)

name: 金羅漢果糖水
recipe: 1. 金羅漢果洗淨後剝成小塊。 (Wash the monk fruit and break it into small pieces.)
2. 加入金羅漢及水煮約半小時過篩。 (Add the monk fruit and water, then boil for about half an hour and strain.)
3. 雪耳浸軟撕碎，剪走較硬部分備用。 (Soak the snow fungus until soft, tear it apart, and trim away the harder parts.)
4. 羅漢果水加入雪耳、紅棗及桂圓，加蓋煮約半小時。 (Add the monk fruit water, snow fungus, red dates, and longan to a pot, cover, and cook for about half an hour.)
5. 按情況及味道加水煮勻，完成。 (Adjust the consistency and flavor by adding more water as needed and stir to finish.)

name: 紅糖糍粑
item: 黃豆粉 (Soy Bean Powder) 適量
recipe: 1. 40毫升熱水及砂糖加入糯米粉拌勻。 (Combine 40 ml of hot water and sugar with the glutinous rice flour and mix well.)
2. 再加約30毫升水及砂糖拌勻成團。 (Add about 30 ml of water and mix until a dough forms.)
3. 保鮮紙包住粉團，擀成長方形後切條。 (Wrap the dough in plastic wrap, roll it out into a rectangle, and cut into strips.)
4. 紅糖、水及鹽以小火煮至濃稠後熄火。 (Cook the brown sugar, water, and salt over low heat until thickened, then turn off the heat.)
5. 下油燒熱鍋，粉團以中小火煎至金黃色盛起。 (Heat oil in a pan and fry the dough strips over medium-low heat until golden brown, then remove.)
6. 糍粑表面灑上黃豆粉及紅糖漿，完成。 (Sprinkle the surface of the rice cakes with soy bean powder and drizzle with the brown sugar syrup to finish.)

name: 岩燒芝士蛋糕
recipe: 1. 雞蛋分開蛋黃蛋白。 (Separate the egg yolks from the egg whites.)
2. 蛋黃、蜜糖及牛奶拌勻。 (Mix the egg yolks, honey, and milk together.)
3. 加入已過篩的低筋麵粉拌勻至沒有顆粒。 (Add the sifted cake flour and mix until there are no lumps.)
4. 預熱焗爐至170℃，蛋糕模鋪牛油紙。 (Preheat the oven to 170°C and line the cake pan with parchment paper.)
5. 蛋白加入砂糖打至挺身。 (Beat the egg whites with sugar until stiff peaks form.)
6. 分次加入蛋白霜至蛋黃漿，以切拌方法混合。 (Gradually fold the meringue into the egg yolk mixture using a cutting motion.)
7. 加入植物油稍為拌勻。 (Add the vegetable oil and mix gently.)
8. 一口氣加入蛋糕模，稍為搖平蛋糕漿。 (Pour the batter into the cake pan and gently tap to level.)
9. 以170℃焗15分鐘，溫度調低至150℃再焗25分鐘，中途旋轉蛋糕令受熱更平均。 (Bake at 170°C for 15 minutes, then lower the temperature to 150°C and bake for another 25 minutes, rotating the cake halfway for even cooking.)
10. 蛋糕出爐，反轉放涼，脫模，輕輕掃走蛋糕表面的碎屑。 (Remove the cake from the oven, invert to cool, unmold, and gently brush off any crumbs.)
11. 芝士片、無鹽牛油、蜜糖及牛奶，以小火煮溶拌勻，同時預熱焗爐至220℃。 (Melt the sliced cheese, unsalted butter, honey, and milk over low heat, while preheating the oven to 220°C.)
12. 芝士漿平均塗抹在蛋糕表面。 (Spread the cheese mixture evenly over the surface of the cake.)
13. 以220℃焗3-4分鐘至表面微微燒焦，完成。 (Bake at 220°C for 3-4 minutes until the surface is slightly charred, then it's done.)

name: 日式照烧酱
recipe: 1. 將醬油、糖和芝麻油放入碗中。 (Combine soy sauce, sugar, and sesame oil in a bowl.)
2. 在小火上加熱鍋子。 (Heat a pot over low heat.)
3. 將澱粉加入水中。 (Dissolve the starch in water.)
4. 將醬油混合物倒入鍋中。 (Pour the soy sauce mixture into the pot.)
5. 在小火上加熱，然後將澱粉水倒入鍋中。 (Heat over low and then add the starch water to the pot.)
